name: BOUNCED
detailed_description:
BOUNCED, is a beautiful low-poly 3D Platforming game that is easy to play, but hard to master.

Play as a one of ten spirit guardians that have taken care of the Earth since the dawn of creation. However, an evil power has overtaken the heats of the other guardians, and now it is up to you to fight back the evil that has plagued their heart, and to save the earth from destruction.

Bounced has been created to be played on low spec machines without sacrificing aesthetic.

Features:
  • 60 levels of platforming fun spanning over 6 unique worlds; Island, Snow, Desert, City Lava and Space
  • Beautiful eye catching graphics
  • Easy and Intuitive controls
  • Teleportation and Time Manipulation game-play
  • Hidden Collectables
  • Boss Battles
  • Relaxing and tranquil music
  • Low poly visuals
  • Achievements
  • Free DLC - 30 more levels (3 more unique worlds - coming Sept 2017)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Leopard 10.7
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card or onboard graphics compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% CoreAudio compatible card or onboard sound
